name: Live Warfare: Real-Life First-Person-Shooter Mobile App
blurb: Future real-life FPS App. Imagine a Call-of-Duty type app that lets you play in person in real life, and your phone is your weapon.

name: Nathan Nash Eyal and Omer C. Eyal

rewards.reward: Early updates on developments (before the general public), a solute and a huge Thank You!
Download of the app.  Early updates on developments (before the general public), a solute and a huge Thank You!
650 Armory Units for in-app purchases (instead of 550), early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!
Meritorious Service Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); 1,600 Armory Units for in-app purchases (instead of 1,200), early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Bronze Star Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded, 3,500 Armory Units for in-app purchases (instead of 2,500 in app), early updates,  a solute and a huge Thank You!

Soldier's Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile), a backers-only full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded; 4,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases, early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Soldier's Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile), a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded and a full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded with a suppressor, 4,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases, early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Legion of Merit Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); a backers-only full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded, a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded; 8,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases, a Live Warfare T-shirt (free shipping in U.S.), early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Superior Service Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); your listing engraved in the Live Warfare App Producer Hall of Fame; pre-launch downloads (beta & final); a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded and a full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded; 8,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases; a Live Warfare T-shirt (free shipping in U.S.); early updates; a solute and a huge Thank You!

Silver Star Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); personal call from Nathan thanking you for your support and courage; your listing engraved in the Live Warfare Executive Producer Hall of Fame; pre-launch downloads (beta & final); a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded and a full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded; 8,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases; a Live Warfare T-shirt (free shipping in U.S.); early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Distinguished Service Cross (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); personal visit with Nathan (in Orlando) thanking you for your support and courage; your listing engraved in the Live Warfare  Executive Producer Hall of Fame; pre-launch downloads (beta & final); a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded and a full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded; 8,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases; a Live Warfare T-shirt (free shipping in U.S.); early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Distinguished Service Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile), real-life operational high-end R/C attack vehicle with video feed and app-controlled operation; your listing engraved in the Live Warfare Executive Producer Hall of Fame; pre-launch downloads (beta & final); a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded and a full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded; 8,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases; a Live Warfare T-shirt (free shipping in U.S.); early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!

Medal of Honor Medal (on-line profile) and stripe (in-game profile); custom weapon in the Armory with your name engraved on it, a Live Warfare competitive region named after you; a war hero statue in in your honor in the Live Warfare Joint Chiefs of Staff Hall of Fame; personal dinner with the Live Warfare team, pre-launch downloads (beta & final); a backers-only semi-auto MK 14 rifle fully upgraded and a full-auto ACR (Adaptive Combat Rifle) fully upgraded; 8,000 Armory Units for in-app purchases; a Live Warfare T-shirt (free shipping in U.S.); early updates, a solute and a huge Thank You!
